messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Olympic Update from Park City, UT
messages.msgSnippet: Well, the helicopters are buzzing overhead, Olympic athletes are jogging down my block, Greenpeace has a huge hot-air balloon floating in the field behind my
messages.messageBody:
Well, the helicopters are buzzing overhead, Olympic athletes are jogging
down my block, Greenpeace has a huge hot-air balloon floating in the field
behind my house, crowds have swarmed in today to witness the torch on its'
way down to Salt Lake, the shuttle busses are up and running in all their
toxic-fumed glory and the FBI has taken over my library for the rest of the
month.

As fun as it all sounds, we figure it'll be easier to just watch it all on
TV like the rest of you, so we're escaping to Florida for the next two
weeks. ;-) I even get to meet up with some of the Florida unschoolers while
I'm there. :o)

I'll be setting my list preferences to "no mail" while I'm away, so don't
talk about anything too cool till I get back. K? ;-)

Back in two weeks.
~Mary
